Description:
Cloverdale Estate Special!
Take a moment to let the possibilities sink in. Only moments from local shopping precincts, Corio Shopping Centre, sporting facilities, popular schools, kindergarten, childcare centre & easy access to the Ring Road. This superbly built solid brick home is set in a perfect location in ever popular Cloverdale Estate. The moment you walk in you will be impressed with the light filled frontal formal lounge area with cathedral ceilings leads to kitchen/dining with well-equipped facilities including gas stove/oven & plenty of cupboard space. You will be impressed with the 3 large bedrooms all with built in robes, fans throughout & a convenient central bathroom including bathtub and separate toilet. Outside is perfect for entertaining with oversized undercover pergola and spacious yard great for all seasons will be a talking point amongst buyers. Extras include, gas wall heater, split system, large single carport and garage, storage shed, low maintenance well-kept garden. If your wanting to grow your investment portfolio or simply move in the best estate in the Northern Suburbs this is a must inspect! Don't delay call me now!
*All information about the property has been provided to hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Character home in a quiet location.
Be the one to embrace the rewarding opportunity presented by this fabulous home in a sought-after Corio location. Set on a fantastic 604sqm (approx.) block, there's enough space to renovate the existing home or extend and create your dream home (STCA). The home itself introduces three spacious bedrooms (two with BIRs) serviced by a central bathroom before arriving at a large U-shaped living/kitchen area in the heart of the home. Quality and character overflow in the well equipped kitchen which is accompanied by sit-down dinners with the family in the spacious dining room. Enjoy the benefits of gas heating, air conditioning, laundry and double car carport with ample off-street parking. City professionals will love the ease in which they can access the Princes Highway while swift access to trendy cafes, the Corio Shopping Centre, local schools and public transport makes this rewarding home hard to beat! Call to enquire today.

Description:
Tastefully Updated Family Home close to the Action!
Updated throughout and ready for you to move in and enjoy, this fantastic four bedroom home situated on a generous block with north-facing backyard represents an excellent opportunity to enter the market or invest in a growing area. Located within walking distance of Corio Central Shopping centre and less than 5 minutes from either the Melbourne Road or Geelong Ring Road, this home is within close proximity to all amenities and easy access to Melbourne.
Freshly finished in light contemporary tones, the home presents beautifully and provides the ideal layout for modern living. The open plan living, dining and kitchen area forms the main hub of the home and is both stylish and practical. The generous sized kitchen offers ample storage, quality appliances and a large island bench that forms the centrepiece of the room. The adjoining dining and living areas are spacious and well connected to the large outdoor undercover area, perfect for entertaining.
Four good sized bedrooms all include robes and a large central bathroom is well positioned within the floorplan.
Outdoors a large double garage and long driveway provide plenty of space for off-street parking. The expansive north-facing backyard offers a huge sun-drenched space to be enjoyed all year round by the family or pets.
Additional features include 8 x solar panels, gas central heating and split system cooling providing comfortable and economical living.
This is a wonderful opportunity for first home buyers, investors or families looking for that extra space that few properties offer. Move in and enjoy, no need to lift a finger!! Dont miss this one.

Description:
Great Home, Magnificent Opportunity
Located in a quiet Cul De Sac, this well-presented home is sure to impress even the fussiest of home buyers. Offering the investor a solid, low-maintenance purchase with tenants in place keen to continue their decade-long tenancy or an unbeatable first home or downsizer for those looking to buy in one of Corios neatest little pockets.
It features:
Master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe
2 more bedrooms with built in robes and ceiling fans
Large lounge with split-system heating and cooling and a study nook
Large kitchen and casual dining featuring abundant pantry space
El fresco entertaining area and huge rear garage/rumpus room
Quiet court location with childrens playground and Paley Reserve within metres
Within minutes of Corio Village Shopping Centre, local schools and child care and easy access to the ring-road, this property is ripe for the picking.
To arrange your private inspection call Wilsons today.

Description:
Quality first home or investment
For first home buyers looking to break into the market or investors seeking a quiet investment property in a convenient location? This home is move-in ready and will tick all the boxes for a wide range of buyers. The layout features two bedrooms, both with built-in robes, family bathroom with separate shower and bath, formal lounge and a formal dining room. Floorboards flow throughout ensuring a modern and inviting appeal while ducted heating, air-conditioning and ceiling fans add extra comfort. Prepare meals in the neat and tidy kitchen complete with plenty of storage and bench space or soak up the sunshine in the great-sized backyard. The backyard yard also offers a large single garage with a remote-controlled roller door and a workshop area plus ample room for storing a boat, trailer or caravan. You'll enjoy peaceful and private living while still being within easy walking distance of schools, parks and bus stops while the Corio Central shopping centre is only five minutes away. The Geelong Ring Road is also easily accessible making for a fast commute to Melbourne of Geelong CBD.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A comfortable family oasis.
This spectacular yet spacious home is an architectural triumph in family-sized sophistication. Boasting the best of indoor/outdoor living, enhanced by a well-designed entertaining area with detailed finishes throughout the home, you will feel like you have walked into a hotel.
Superbly presented with attention to detail, this home embodies style, elegance and refinement. The heart of the home has a sun-drenched open plan living and dining zone incorporating a stylish kitchen with ample storage and a pantry.
Undivided outdoor entertaining is present in this home as you will feel like you have your own private oasis. Including a decked al fresco perfect for those summer nights with family and friends. The home offers three generous robed bedrooms with a central bathroom and a separate laundry.
Extra luxuries include air-conditioning, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, gas heating and a double car garage with double car port.
Centrally located for all your family's needs and just a short stroll to local schools, the Corio Shopping Centre, public transport and the Princes Highway for those who commute. Call to enquire today!

Completely renovated throughout, this bright, modern home is ready for its new owner. Whether you want easy-care living, downsizing or a savvy addition to your property portfolio, this home is a must-see. Inside, a fresh colour scheme, timber floors and lots of natural light enhance the sense of space. The Floorplan consists of two sizeable bedrooms, open plan kitchen living and meals area and modernised bathroom. The modern kitchen boasts a gas cooktop and electric oven, stylish white cabinetry and plenty of storage. The open plan has a great flow, creating a welcoming and spacious heart to the home. Extra features include gas heating, a separate carport and an additional storage room included on title. This great home is conveniently located close to schools, shops and transport options. For those who work in the city, it's just two turns until you're heading into Geelong or Melbourne.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Polished at the Perfect Price
This three bedroom built-to-last brick veneer home situated only minutes from Geelong Ring Road, Corio Village and multiple Northern Bay campuses is ready for the first home buyer or investor to take full advantage of from the moment you turn the key!
Featuring a recently updated bathroom as well as freshly painted interiors, the addition of a brand new freestanding gas cooktop/electric oven, gas wall furnace and air conditioner further compliments the many contemporary touches. You will also revel in gorgeous natural light against pristine hardwood floors, soaking your lounge and dining areas right through to your bedrooms from the north-west.
Balancing manicured gardens and a neat and tidy open lawn space, the outdoor alfresco is naturally the ideal for entertaining however would also lend itself nicely for the boat or trailer.
Planted firmly on a 557m2 allotment, the astute investor will benefit from Residential Growth Zoning as potential land bank for the future whilst the owner occupier will be excited by the prospect of bringing in Christmas and the New Year in their brand new home!

Description:
Perfect First Home or Investment
Fantastic opportunity to purchase one or both townhouses for the astute investor, downsizer or first home buyer. Low maintenance and only five years old, the townhouses provide comfort with convenience.
Downstairs offers open plan, spacious living with central kitchen, meals and lounge area. Stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, dishwasher, European laundry and powder room. Upstairs provides two generous bedrooms with built in robes and central bathroom. Each townhouse is complete with a single carport, split system air conditioning/heating, secure courtyard, garden shed and 2000 litre water tank.
Conveniently located minutes from to the Geelong Ring Road, Princes Highway and close proximity to further amenities such as quality schools, sporting facilities and Corio Shopping Centre. Only 15 minutes to Geelong's CBD and Melbourne is under an hour away making it ideal for commuters. Townhouse 2 is being sold with a tenant in place on a periodic lease renting at $270.00 per week and Townhouse 3 is being sold with vacant possession. With such outstanding value on offer, dont miss out, inspect now!

Description:
Charming Family Home in Quiet Court Location
What a fantastic opportunity to get your foot in the market with this updated, well-proportioned home with plenty of yard space for kids and pets to enjoy.
Modernised with an open-plan kitchen, living & dining area, with beautiful floating vinyl floorboards, this truly is a comfortable home, and easily also lends itself as an ideal investment property and/or development opportunity (STCA) for the astute purchaser.
The home itself is set on a whopping 640m2, and comprises;
3 x oversized bedrooms, two with BIRs
Fully renovated central bathroom
Large split system heating/cooling unit catering for the entire house
Powered double garage with concrete floor
Landscaped front yard and expansive, low maintenance rear yard
Extras include; repainted house exterior and kitchen cupboards, re-cladded & re-insulated roof, concrete stumps
Zoned: Residential Growth - Schedule 2
The well-resourced Corio Village Shopping Centre is literally around the corner which includes various shopping, medical, food and café facilities, whilst easy public transport options surround you. Schooling options are in your immediate vicinity along with sports and recreational facilities, and the nearby ring-road access allows a quick commute to Melbourne.
Call now to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Home sweet home.
Calling all first home buyers, investors and downsizers alike. Nestled away in a quiet street location on a 208m2 (approx.) block, this stunningly presented unit offers a peaceful ambience with an excellent rear court yard ideal for year round entertaining. The internal features of the home consist of a spacious open plan living/kitchen and meals area with all the space you need for those family gatherings. Fully equipped kitchen with stone benchtops, gas stove, dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space. The two bedrooms (both with BIR's) are cleverly zoned away from the living and are accompanied by a central bathroom that is drenched in plenty of natural light & offers a separate shower and bath for those with young children, whilst there is access to the laundry from the garage. Further features include split system heating & cooling, carpeted floors, ceiling fans and single lock up garage. Located close by to local schools, public transport, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters. A property this good won't last long! Call to inspect today.

Description:
More than meets the eye.
Sparkling with sunshine and infused with style, this single level home offers the perfect easy-care lifestyle for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor, with peaceful placement in the bowl of a quiet court.
Tucked beyond a gorgeous manicured front yard, the home offers a glorious lounge room with wood heater, while the spacious kitchen and meals zone features dishwasher, gas stove and electric oven. A separate living zone is located close by to the kitchen/meals area directly across from the study nook.
Out back, a fuss-free yard is home to an entertaining zone that offers the ideal space for summertime BBQs or as a private space to relax in the sunshine under the alfresco.
All three bedrooms benefit from the inclusion of built-in-robes, while a bright updated central bathroom with toilet is an added convenience.
Superbly complemented by gas heating, split system air conditioning, garden shed plus a single garage.
Situated in a location that offer easy access to local schools, public transport, Corio Shopping Centre and the Princes Highway for commuters.
This home really is one you will want to add to the top of your inspection list!

Description:
"Family Living At It's Finest"
Situated in the highly sought after Rose Park estate, is this immaculate family home on a large 612m2 block (approx.). Oozing quality and style, this home boasts 3 great-sized bedrooms all with built-in robes & a recently renovated stunning ensuite and walk-in robe to the main bedroom. The choice is yours with an extra-large study or 4th bedroom. Large open plan kitchen/meals and main living area plus a formal lounge or second living room. Step outside to the amazing enclosed outdoor entertaining area with a built-in BBQ connected to gas line and bar area plus a log fire for those winter nights. Double lock up remote controlled garage and enough room for caravan/boat/trailer parking at the side. Superbly maintained and lovingly owned by one owner, this property is one not to be missed!
-Immaculately Presented Family Home
-4 Bedrooms, or 3 Plus Large Study
-Large Open Plan Kitchen/Dining/Living
-2 Living Areas
-Ducted Heating & Evaporative Cooling Throughout
-Stunning Outdoor Entertaining Area with Built-in BBQ and Bar
-Large 612m2 Block (Approx.)
-Close to Schools, Shops, Medical Facilities & Public Transport
-Easy Access to Geelong Ring Rd & Princes Hwy for Melbourne/Surf Coast Commuting
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
First home or investment beauty
Here's a chance to secure an amazing first home or investment opportunity in the prized Cloverdale Estate, renowned for easy access to schools, Corio Village, Geelong CBD & the Ring Road. In the same family for the last 35 years, the home is as neat as a pin. With open plan living, functional kitchen & meals/dining area, 3 generous bedrooms with robes and as new carpet throughout, well maintained bathroom with bath, shower recess & vanity. There's comfort with gas heating and reverse cycle cooling. The secure yard features a lock double garage and easy-care gardens & lawns on a 555m2 allotment. Inspection won't disappoint and this won't last long. Call today for more info.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
The Perfect Starter in a Peaceful Court Location
Its time for this family home of some 50 years to change hands, and whether it be for your first home, investment or development project (STCA), an endless list of possibilities awaits.
Refreshed right throughout and ready to be tenanted or owner-occupied, this cosy home still lends itself equally to a renovation or potential subdivision, and a quiet court full of friendly, long-term neighbours awaits the lucky purchaser.
Positioned on a substantial allotment of approx. 655m2, the home itself comprises;
3 x good-sized bedrooms, two with BIRs
Spacious, light-filled lounge with gas heater & split system heating/ac unit
Updated bathroom with separate WC
Functional kitchen with good cupboard storage
Extras include; charming gas-log fire, carport, garden shed, stunning polished floorboards throughout
Zoned: Residential Growth - Schedule 2
Just a short stroll will find you at the Corio Village Shopping Centre which includes various shopping, medical, Centrelink, food and café facilities, whilst a host of bus-stops and schooling options are in your immediate vicinity. Community Centers, the Corio Library, parkland, sports/leisure centers and ring-road access are all nearby to complete an easy and convenient lifestyle.
Call Wilsons today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Your Next Project
Here is a home on a corner site, handy to reserves, shops and perfect for you to roll up your sleeves and make your own. Offering three good size bedrooms, kitchen waiting for you to add your own touches and adjacent dining. A generous living room, family bathroom and separate laundry. Outside there is a carport and established lawn. This is an opportunity for those that don't mind putting in the work to reap the rewards. Ideal for investors looking to add another property to the portfolio to the first home buyer looking to get into the market. Don't let this one pass you by, call today!

Description:
The Affordable Dream
Now is the time to stop renting and start securing your future. Interest rates are low and we have the perfect home for you. This home is as solid as a rock and offers 3 generous bedrooms with built in robes, large lounge, updated kitchen with plenty of cupboard space. Outside there is a large garage with combined workshop and carport allowing for ample off-street parking for the boat or caravan. All situated on a great block of 639m2 located smack bang in the middle of the Residential Growth Zone making this one of the best buys this year, within close proximity to schools, Corio Village Shopping centre, public transport and medical facilities. Don't miss this opportunity to own this prime piece of real estate.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
